LoginForm.signInToAccess: Sign in to access your Finly dashboard.
LoginForm.loginFailedGoogle: Could not sign in with Google. Please try again.
LoginForm.loginFailedCredentials: Invalid email or password. Please try again.
LoginForm.loginUnknownError: An unknown error occurred during login.

SignupForm.joinFinlyDescription: Join Finly to start managing your finances.
SignupForm.signupFailedGoogle: Could not sign up with Google. Please try again.
SignupForm.accountCreatedDescription: Welcome to Finly! Redirecting to dashboard...

DashboardPage.financialOverview: Here's your financial overview. Let's make today financially productive!
DashboardPage.trackNewExpenseDesc: Log your spending to stay on top of your budget.
DashboardPage.recentExpensesDesc: A quick look at your latest transactions.
DashboardPage.financialWellnessDesc: Stay positive and focused on your financial journey. Small steps lead to big results!

ExpensesPage.addNewExpenseDesc: Keep a detailed record of your spending.
ExpensesPage.allExpensesDesc: View and manage all your tracked expenses.
ExpensesPage.errorLoadingData: Could not load your financial data.

AdvisorPage.leverageAI: Leverage artificial intelligence to get personalized financial insights and saving tips.
AdvisorPage.aiAnalysisDescription: Our AI analyzes your spending habits, income, and financial goals to provide tailored advice. The more information you provide (especially in Settings) and the more consistently you track your expenses, the smarter and more helpful your AI advisor becomes.
AdvisorPage.privacyNote: Privacy Note: Your financial data is processed securely. We are committed to protecting your privacy.
AdvisorPage.errorLoadingAdvisor: Could not load your financial data for the advisor.

SettingsPage.userProfileDesc: Manage your personal information and financial settings. Your changes will be saved to your account.
SettingsPage.financialGoalsPlaceholder: e.g., Save for a vacation, build emergency fund
SettingsPage.errorLoadProfile: Could not load your profile data.

RecentExpenses.noExpenses: No expenses tracked yet. Add an expense to get started!
RecentExpenses.deleteExpenseAlertDescription: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the expense "{description}".

SavingTips.cardDescription: Get personalized advice to reach your financial goals faster. Ensure your profile income and goals are set in Settings for best results.
SavingTips.incomeTip: Tip: Set your income in Settings for it to auto-fill here.
SavingTips.goalsTip: Tip: Set your financial goals in Settings for them to auto-fill here.
SavingTips.spendingPatternsPlaceholder: e.g., I tend to overspend on dining out, or trying to reduce subscription costs.
SavingTips.spendingPatternsTip: If left blank, AI will infer from your expense categories.
SavingTips.errorIncomeRequiredDesc: Please enter your monthly income or set a positive value in your profile settings.
SavingTips.errorGoalsRequiredDesc: Please describe your financial goals or set them in your profile settings.
SavingTips.tipsGeneratedDesc: AI has provided personalized saving tips.

SpendingAlerts.cardDescription: Let AI warn you about unusual spending patterns based on your tracked expenses.
SpendingAlerts.errorUserNotFoundDesc: Cannot check for spikes without user data.
SpendingAlerts.errorNotEnoughDataDesc: Please add at least 3 expenses to analyze spending spikes effectively.
SpendingAlerts.noSpikesDesc: Your spending looks normal based on the provided data.
SpendingAlerts.errorCheckSpikes: Could not check for spending spikes.
SpendingAlerts.noSpikesOrAnalyze: No significant spending spikes detected, or click above to analyze.
SpendingAlerts.addExpensesFirst: Add some expenses first to check for spikes.

ReviewForm.title: Leave a Review
ReviewForm.description: Share your experience with us. Your feedback helps us grow!
ReviewForm.validationCommentMin: Comment must be at least 3 characters
